::Shadow Wing::

She smiled, She could see by the expression on his face that he was 
thinking about something.
"Megatron has retreated back to his base for now. Let's be happy that 
this battle was won and recover before the next battle." She wondered 
what was occupying his thoughts.  But she wouldn't ask.  She would 
wait to see if he would tell her.
"Let's get back to the ship and take care of things there."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine was shocked at her response once again, Almost embarased 
by 
> this display of emotion so close to his fellow Maximals. "Easy 
Wing, 
> we might have won this battle but the tyrants still functioning." 
He 
> couldn't yet put all the pieces together but he fealt an 
unremembered 
> grudge toward Megatron. He dropped it for now, it was probably a 
> grudge that aall the Maximals have against him. "If Megatron took 
off 
> through the woods I'll find him, and when I do he's slag." 
> Immediately the wolf remembered another score he had to settle. 
This 
> one against the beast who cost him his major optics. (Ares)
>
